sentence.Network_en: If the main purpose of menus were to execute commands, terseness would be a virtue.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果菜单的主要目的是执行命令, 那么就应该精练.

sentence.Network_en: What strikes at a first reading is its vividness and terseness.
sentence.Network_cn: 初读时它给人的印象是生动和简洁.

sentence.Network_en: Featured as terseness, flexibility and generality, vague language successfully meets the demand of diplomacy.
sentence.Network_cn: 模糊语言的简明性 、 灵活性和概括性的特点正好符合了外交语言的要求.
